content.text: Hi there! My name is Nick and I'm from the Bay area.
Hello Nick, I'm Emily. I'm getting married next week.
Congratulations! That's exciting! I hope you have a beautiful wedding.
Thanks, I'm really excited. I'm getting married in a small ceremony with my closest friends and family.
That sounds perfect. I'm sure it will be a beautiful day.
I'm hoping so. I'm really nervous, but also really excited.
I can imagine. It's a big step. But I'm sure you'll do great.
So, what are you doing for work?
I'm a teacher. I teach kindergarten.
Oh, that's great. I'm sure you love working with kids.
I do. It's the best job in the world.
I can imagine. I love kids too.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, camping, and fishing.
That sounds fun. I like to go hiking too.
